name: Repositorio ANID
description: Diseminates, manages, and preserves scientific production and results funded by ANID, facilitating open access. Contains over 70,000 resources, including articles, book chapters, patents, audiovisual materials, maps, software, books, manuscripts, reports, presentations, theses, data management plans, and research data.
owner_name: Agencia Nacional de Investigación y Desarrollo (ANID)
